name: NPR
text:
Sen. James Lankford says one concern is tied to the 9/11 Commission, which said a lack of cooperation during the 2000 transition may have hurt preparations that could've thwarted the attack.

"This was...an issue of saying let's learn the lesson of 2000." https://t.co/PkkUU8qqxt

name: NPR
text:
The pandemic has upended many aspects of domestic life.

That's brought new attention to one of the most enduring disparities between men and women: the wide difference in handling housework and child care.
https://t.co/mwfx1QmDBa
